name: Vanilla Bean - Whipped Argan Oil Refillable Firming Body Butter Jar
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is: An air-whipped full-body moisturizer with argan oil that rapidly soaks in, delivering juicy firmness, intense hydration, and an all-over glow.Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy.Scent Type: Warm & Sheer.Key Notes: Pure Vanilla Bean ExtractFragrance Description: Craving something sweet? Creamy vanilla with hint of rich caramel will leave skin smelling deliciously come-hither. Yumm…About the Fragrance: As fragrance purists and planet lovers, Josie Maran uses only 100 percent plant-based essences: real fruits, nuts, woods, and plants. Because nothing beats the real thing..Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamin E..- Avocado Oil: Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness, rich in antioxidants..- Shea Butter: Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...What Else You Need to Know: This body butter absorbs rapidly on dry skin for a velvety-soft and firming finish that lasts all day. Responsibly sourced argan is whipped to creamy perfection with 100 percent plant-based fragrances in a lightweight yet rich formula. With the refill system, top up your amber glass jar and reuse forever...Research Results: In a consumer perception survey of 39 people using the body butter on their thighs, stomach, and arms:.- 100% agreed their skin felt deeply hydrated and moisturized throughout the day after one use.- 97% agreed that the product provided an instant glow after one use.- 97% saw a noticeable improvement in firmness and tone after 2 weeks.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Argan Oil:  An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and Vitamin E..-Avocado Oil: Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness; rich in antioxidants..-Shea Butter: Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...Aqua (Water)**, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil**, Glyceryl Stearate**, Glycerin**, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter**, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyl Dimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Vanilla Planifolia (Vanilla) Fruit Extract**, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract**, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract**, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract**, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract**, Squalane**, Beta-Carotene**, Tocopherol**, Allantoin**, Panthenol**, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate**, Polysorbate-60**, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol**, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol. ..*Organic..**Naturally Derived...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage generously into skin for an instant moisture boost..Josie’s tip:.-For best results, use after showering when pores are open and receptive to the whipped, velvety goodness....Recycling Instructions:.-Remove the cap of the jar, remove red liner from inside the cap, rinse both cap and jar thoroughly, and drop the separated jar and cap in your at-home recycling bin..-Liner can be recycled through TerraCycle. Flatten product box and drop in your at-home recycling bin..-Recycle pouch through TerraCycle....Refill Product Instructions:.-With the refill pouches, you can top up your gorgeous amber glass jar and reuse it forever. Each pouch refills the 6 oz. jar 2.25 times.
